RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 79. Claiming Purse 19000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR FOUR YEAR OLDS. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since December 28 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000, if for $10,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WRONGWAYHIGHWAY brushed the outer part of the gate, tracked three wide, ranged up in the four path in upper stretch to bid at the furlong grounds, and drove clear. QUARTER RAT bumped with an outer rival at the start, rated at the rear along the inside, shifted out five wide in upper stretch, and offered a late rally to gain place nearing the wire. DUKE OF BLUE RIDGE pressed two wide, bid turning for home, but was outkicked by an outer rival at the furlong grounds after briefly delaying his lead change, kept on to gain place entering the final sixteenth as the rider stood momentarily, but was bested by an outer rallying rival for that position late. ITELLYOUTHEFACTS bumped with an inner rival leaving the gates, stalked along the inside, but lacked progress in the lane. THE THREE KS took a brush from an inner rival at the start, set the pace, vied with an outer bidder turning for home, but was headed by a wider challenger leaving the furlong grounds, and weakened. BAQUERO'S BIND leaned out and brushed a rival at the start, lacked speed in the two path, and was done early.

ENTRY.NAME: Quarter Rat
ENTRY.COMMENT: bump start,at rear ins,shifted out 5wd upr,rallied,up place late

ENTRY.NAME: Itellyouthefacts
ENTRY.COMMENT: bump start, stalked inside, chased

ENTRY.NAME: Baquero's Bind
ENTRY.COMMENT: leaned out/brush start, off pace 2p, done early

ENTRY.NAME: The Three Ks
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed start, set pace, ins foe 2nd, headed 1/8, wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Duke of Blue Ridge
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2wd, bid 1/4, outkicked 1/8, up place 1/16, bested

ENTRY.NAME: Wrongwayhighway
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed gate, tracked 3wd, 4p upr, bid 1/8, drove clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 2 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 20000. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR THREE YEAR OLDS. Three Year Olds, 117 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since December 28 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GOLDEN PEGASUS stalked from the three path, allowed an outer rival to make first bid down the backstretch, shifted outside of the top pair to press entering the far turn, bid at the five sixteenths pole sparking a duel with MOUNT KENYA, inched an advantage in upper stretch, and held in the stretch-long battle. MOUNT KENYA tracked the leaders from the four path, made an early bid for the lead at the half mile pole, forged an advantage while tucking to the two path nearing the three furlong marker, dug in to resist GOLDEN PEGASUS's outer bid turning for home, fought on after being headed in upper stretch, sustained the battle while hanging on his left lead through the final furlong, but was bested. IZEONDEC was brushed by an outer rival causing him to graze an inner foe at the start, raced at the rear along the inside, moved up two wide and between horses around the far turn, stayed on to bid for show along with an outer LEROY JENKINS nearing midstretch, sparred through the final furlong, and prevailed. LEROY JENKINS leaned in at the start, raced at the rear two to three wide, stayed on to duel for show with an inner rival through the final furlong, but was kept at bay. TOP NOTE leaned in at the start, tugged clear in the two path around the first turn, but weakened inside of a pair of foes with three furlongs to go. GOROSTIETA'S LOVE tracked along the inside, and weakened into the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Gorostieta's Love
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, wknd 7/16

ENTRY.NAME: Izeondec
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed btw start,at rear ins,2w2nd,stayed on,show duel,prevailed

ENTRY.NAME: Leroy Jenkins
ENTRY.COMMENT: leaned in start,at rear 2-3wd,stayed on,show duel,missed

ENTRY.NAME: Mount Kenya
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 3w-4p,bid 2w1/2,led 2p3/8,dug in5/16,duel,left lead,bestd

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Pegasus
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 2w-3p,3w2nd,bid 2w-3p5/16,dueled,led,long battle,prevaild

ENTRY.NAME: Top Note
ENTRY.OWNER: Hoffman Farms Racing LLC and Alexis Claire Racing Services LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: leaned ins start, tugged clear 2p, wknd ins pair 3/8

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 68. Maiden Claiming Purse 28000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 120 lbs. Claiming Price $50,000 (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $30,000 In Their Last 3 Starts).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SAVAGE DARLING broke slowly and trailed the short field early on, gained three wide around the turn, took aim on the clear leader leaving the furlong grounds, bid in the final sixteenth, and drove clear. CINCO DE CUATRO set the pace along the inside, inched clear turning for home, held sway through upper stretch, but was caught in the final sixteenth. MIKITA pressed two wide, but gave way between horses turning for home, then held show through the final furlong. BELLA PALOMA tracked along the inside under snug restraint through the opening quarter mile, and failed to factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Savage Darling
ENTRY.OWNER: C and H Diamond Racing LLC Baccari Racing Stable LLC and Magdalena Racing (Sherr
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow start, trailed, gained 3wd turn, aim 1/8, bid 1/16, cleared

ENTRY.NAME: Bella Paloma
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, snug hold, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Cinco de Cuatro
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace ins, inched clear 5/16, held sway upper, caught late

ENTRY.NAME: Mikita
ENTRY.OWNER: BHMFR LLC and Tagg Team Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2wd, gave way btwn 5/16, held show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 79. Allowance Purse 53000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since December 28 Allowed 3 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WHOLELOTTAMO was restless in the gate, laid off of the pace along the inside, gained in the three path around the far turn before fanning five wide entering the lane, and rallied to drive past inner foes in the final sixteenth. MEDLEY pressed two wide, vied between horses under steady urging around the far turn, got floated three wide entering the lane, sustained a bid among foes while hanging on his left lead through deep stretch, but was outkicked by an outer bidder late. MISHPACHAH set the pace along the inside, resisted bids turning for home, clung to an advantage from a group of foes entering the final sixteenth, but was bested in the closing stages. BOX OF PICTURES bobbled inwardly at the start while still breaking towards the front, stalked along the inside, smoothly tipped outside of the leader entering the lane to produce a bid two wide and between horses coming to the furlong grounds, but flattened out. BLESSED ANNA tracked three wide, pressed the top pair around the far turn, got floated four wide entering the lane, then was outkicked by an outer rival while yielding leaving the furlong grounds. GATOR PROUD broke slowly while leaning outwardly at the start, then saved ground far back, but to no avail. AVERI EVER AFTER pursued from midpack in the two path around the first turn, but failed to respond to urging around the far turn, and gave way. AKIANE'S SOLDIER raced far back two wide and got outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Gator Proud
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow/leaned out start, far back inside, saved ground, no avail

ENTRY.NAME: Akiane's Soldier
ENTRY.COMMENT: far back 2wd, outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Wholelottamo
ENTRY.COMMENT: restless gate,off pace ins,gain 3p2nd,5w3/16,rally,bid1/16,up lat

ENTRY.NAME: Box of Pictures
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled in start, stalked ins, 2wd btwn 3/16, bid, flattened out

ENTRY.NAME: Averi Ever After
ENTRY.COMMENT: midapck 2p, urged 2nd, no response, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Mishpachah
ENTRY.OWNER: Coteau Grove Farms LLC Yarmuth William and Yarmuth Susan
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, ins quartet 1/8, bested late

ENTRY.NAME: Medley
ENTRY.OWNER: Heiligbrodt Corinne Heiligbrodt L William and Spendthrift Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: press 2wd,vied btw/urged 2nd,3w3/16,left ld,sustaind bid,outkickd

ENTRY.NAME: Blessed Anna
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 3wd, pressed 2wd, 4w3/16, outkicked btw/yielded 1/8

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 5 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 98. Claiming Purse 35000. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES OVER A MILE SINCE JULY 28, 2022. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since December 28 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $35,000, if for $30,000 , allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $25,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SUMMER SPLASH set the pace along the inside, showed the way from a pressing rival around the far turn, shook free in upper stretch, and held sway under a drive. BLUE JAYS settled off of the pace along the inside, launched a gain in the two path around the far turn, shifted out to the four path turning for home, sustained a charge to gain place at the furlong grounds, but leveled off, and was caught at the wire to dead-heat for that position. FIRST GLIMPSE tracked two wide and between horses, got outmoved by an outer rallying rival entering the lane, chased from among foes into midstretch, then altered course five wide and outside of rivals at the sixteenth pole, sustained stride late, and reached a dead-heat for place at the wire. SOUL COAXING stalked two wide, pressed down the backstretch, but yielded in upper stretch, and tired between horses in the final furlong. MY BARILEY tracked along the inside, chased around the far turn, and lacked a bid. SOLID COUNTRY GOLD laid off of the pace three wide, and never got involved. DIRECT ORDER trailed early on, lagged behind leaving the first turn, and was outrun. VIM AND VIGOR chased from the four path, and weakened turning for home.

ENTRY.NAME: Soul Coaxing
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 2wd, pressed 5/8, yielded upr, tired btwn

ENTRY.NAME: dh-Blue Jays
ENTRY.OWNER: JD Thoroughbreds LLC Davis Joey Keith and GenStar Thoroughbreds
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace ins, gained 2-4p5/16, rallied, up place 1/8, caught, DH

ENTRY.NAME: dh-First Glimpse
ENTRY.OWNER: Granger William and Silva Carlos H
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2wd btw,outmoved 1/4,shifted 5w1/16,up place,DH

ENTRY.NAME: My Bariley
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, rail chase, lacked bid

ENTRY.NAME: Summer Splash
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace ins, ins foe 2nd, shook free upper, held sway

ENTRY.NAME: Vim and Vigor
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3wd-4p, wknd 5/16

ENTRY.NAME: Solid Country Gold
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 3wd, never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Direct Order
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, lagged behind, outrun

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 81. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 51000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $100,000. Weight, 122 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 28 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $100,000 (Races Where Entered For $80,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EYEING CLOVER vied two wide, cleared on his own power at the three furlong pole, and drew off under very light hand urging. FROG TOWN bumped with an outer rival at the start, saved ground off of the pace, and sustained a rail rally to gain place nearing the furlong grounds. ZAICI raced off of the pace, shifted out to the five path leaving the nine sixteenths pole to relieve himself from kickback, inched closer in the four path turning for home, produced a bid for place along with an inner foe leaving the three sixteenths pole, but failed to match stride with that one while leveling off at the furlong grounds. BIG BEEMSTER bumped with an inner foe at the start, got herded out to the six path passing the nine sixteenths pole, retreated to trail in the two path entering the turn, angled back to the six path in midstretch, and moved up. MACHINE GUN MAN bumped with an outer foe at the start, stalked the leading pair from the outside, but was outkicked by rivals on either side while fading in upper stretch. BORN FLAWLESS chased four wide early on, but weakened while tucking entering the turn. TIZ THE BIG ONE bumped with an inner rival at the start, vied for the lead inside of the eventual winner, chased that clearing foe leaving the three furlong pole, then faltered between horses in upper stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Zaici
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 5p9/16, 4p turn, rallied upr, place bid3/16, leveld off

ENTRY.NAME: Frog Town
ENTRY.COMMENT: bump start, off pace ins, saved ground, rail rally, secured place

ENTRY.NAME: Big Beemster
ENTRY.COMMENT: bump start, at rear, herded 6p9/16, trail 2p3/8, 6p1/8, moved up

ENTRY.NAME: Machine Gun Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: bump start, stalked pair 3wd, outkicked btwn upr, yieldd

ENTRY.NAME: Tiz the Big One
ENTRY.COMMENT: bump start, vied ins winner, chased 3/8, faltered btwn 3/16

ENTRY.NAME: Eyeing Clover
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed 2wd, cleared in hand 3/8, drew off, handily

ENTRY.NAME: Born Flawless
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4wd, wknd 3p7/16

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 7 1M Turf CR: 73. Maiden Special Weight Purse 50000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 120 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $30,000 In Their Last 3 Starts). (If deemed inadvisable by management to run this race over the turf course, it will be run on the main track at One Mile and 70 Yards.) (Rail at 34 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: I DON'T VENMO set the pace in the three path, showed the way from a pair of bidders in the two path around the far turn, shook free of them entering the lane, and held sway. SLICK AND FAST stalked outside of the top pair and from the five path, ranged up to them from the four path to bid turning for home, but failed to keep pace with the leader entering the lane, and chased that foe home well to prove second best. AMERICAN DOLLARS bumped with an outer rival at the start, pursed from midpack in the two to three paths, tipped out to the five path entering the lane, then to the six path while picking up stride in midstretch, and stayed on to reach show late. REGAL KINGDOM saved ground towards the rear, altered between horses in midstretch, and kept on. F T W SLAM stuttered a step at the start while bumping with an inner rival, stalked along the inside while a bit off of the rail, shifted to the five path entering the lane, gained show at the furlong grounds, but faltered between horses late. JOEY'S GAME hopped a stride after the start, got briefly keen after shying off an inner rival in the aftermath, raced at the rear in the four path, then two path around the far turn, and made little impact. CAJUN CONNECTION pressed the leader from the four path around the first turn, then from the three path and between horses around the far turn, but weakened in upper stretch. SACRED NATION lacked speed in the three to five paths, and was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Regal Kingdom
ENTRY.OWNER: Dupuis Jr Jacques and Bourque Luke
ENTRY.COMMENT: at rear inside, saved ground, altered btwn 1/8, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: American Dollars
ENTRY.OWNER: West Point Thoroughbreds Pearl Racing Hall Racing LLC Coteau Grove Farms LLC Fre
ENTRY.COMMENT: bump start, midpack 3p, 5p1/4, 6p1/8, stayed on, up show late

ENTRY.NAME: F T W Slam
ENTRY.COMMENT: stuttered step/bump st,stalk ins-3p,5p1/4,up show 1/8,falterd btw

ENTRY.NAME: Joey's Game
ENTRY.OWNER: Peterson Stephen J and Necaise Suzette
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped after start/briefly keen, at rear 4p1st, 2p2nd, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: I Don't Venmo
ENTRY.OWNER: Robison J Kirk and Robison Judy
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace 3p1st, ins pair 2p2nd, shook free 1/4, held sway, drivng

ENTRY.NAME: Cajun Connection
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2w-4p1st, 3p btw 2nd, wknd upper

ENTRY.NAME: Slick and Fast
ENTRY.OWNER: Hernandez Earl J Hernandez Keith J and Duvieilh John
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 3wd, 5p1st, 4p2nd, bid 5/16, outpaced 1/4, chased well

ENTRY.NAME: Sacred Nation
ENTRY.OWNER: ELCO Racing LLC and Gallineau Dwayne
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 3p1st, 5p2nd, outrun

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 77. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 51000. FOR FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $80,000. Weight, 122 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 28 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $80,000 (Races Where Entered For $50,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TAYLORS TAP settled off of the pace two wide, gained between horses entering the lane, claimed show in upper stretch, altered course outside of the embattled leading pair at the furlong grounds, surged up to them late, and forged an advantage at the wire. FLAMAND broke outwardly, vied outside of a trio of foes before clearing passing the half mile pole, tucked to the two path soon after, showed the way around the bend before meeting an outer challenge entering the lane, gamely clung to advantage while dueling through midstretch, flopped back to his left lead inside the furlong grounds, then tenaciously fended off her outer counterpart, but was nailed by an outer oncharging rival at the wire. IT TAKES HEART leaned out and bumped a rival at the start, prompted the pace two wide and between horses early on, then stalked the clear leader from the three path around the turn, bid in the four path entering the lane, dueled through midstretch, but was denied while outkicked for place late. BRU NA BOINNE tracked outside of the early leading quartet, chased from the five path around the turn, drifted to the six path entering the lane, and ran on mildly. SHE'S JERSEY TUFF leaned in and bumped a rival at the start, raced at the rear in the five path, spun in to the lane in the seven path, and moved up. MYSTIC STORM broke a step slow, saved ground towards the rear, but to no avail. NEUTRALIZE vied for the lead inside of a trio of rivals early on, rated back to stalk leaving the half mile pole, but faded through the lane. SAENZ took bumps from rivals on both sides at the start, prompted the pace three wide and between horses, chased from the four path around the turn, but weakened among foes in upper stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Neutralize
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside trio, stalked 1/2, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Mystic Storm
ENTRY.OWNER: Wolfe Racing LLC and Robertson, Hugh H.
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow start, far back inside, saved ground, no avail

ENTRY.NAME: Taylors Tap
ENTRY.OWNER: Norman, Mark and Norman Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 2p, gained btwn 1/4, altered out 1/8, late surge, up

ENTRY.NAME: It Takes Heart
ENTRY.COMMENT: leaned out/bump start,prompt 2wbtw,stalk 3p,bid 4p1/4,duel,denied

ENTRY.NAME: Saenz
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped btwn start, prompt 3wd btw, chased 4p, wknd btwn 3/16

ENTRY.NAME: She's Jersey Tuff
ENTRY.COMMENT: leaned in/bump start, at rear 5p, 7p1/4, moved up

ENTRY.NAME: Bru Na Boinne
ENTRY.OWNER: Kirk Kat and Sanders Wayne R
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 5wd, chased 5p turn, drifted out 6p1/4, kept on mildly

ENTRY.NAME: Flamand
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out,vied 4w,clear1/2,2p turn,dug in1/4,game,flop lds1/8,naild

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 9 6F Dirt CR: 78. Allowance Purse 51000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 28 Allowed 3 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $25,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HELAIRE settled off of the pace in the five path, circled rivals entering the lane, and kicked clear in upper stretch. HARD FOUR stalked along the inside while just off of the fence, bid for the lead two wide and between horses entering the lane, but was outkicked by an outer rival soon after, and was second best. TAMBOURINE STAR tracked in the three to four paths, spun into the lane four wide and between horses while getting outkicked, and kept on. PEANUT N IKE saved ground far back, shifted out in midstretch, and moved up. FIELD OF VISION stalked three wide, and yielded between horses at the quarter pole. BANKROLL set the pace along the inside, met a quartet of bids entering the lane, and weakened. FLOWER CAT failed to factor from the four path. GOLDEN SOPO prompted the pace four wide, but went wrong entering the turn, was pulled up, dismounted, and untacked approaching three furlong pole, and got vanned off.

ENTRY.NAME: Tambourine Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 3-4p, 4wd btwn 1/4, outkicked, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Flower Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: far back 4p, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Peanut N Ike
ENTRY.COMMENT: far back inside, shifted out 1/8, moved up

ENTRY.NAME: Bankroll
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace ins, ins quartet 1/4, wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Helaire
ENTRY.OWNER: Roe Steve D and Roe Patricia L
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 5p, circled rivals 1/4, cleared upper

ENTRY.NAME: Hard Four
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked ins-2p, bid 2wd btwn 1/4, outkicked, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Field of Vision
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 3wd, yielded btwn 1/4

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Sopo
ENTRY.COMMENT: forward 4wd, went wrong 7/16, pulled up, vanned off
